speaker: Ty
text: Hey Na, what do you think of this shirt?

speaker: Na
text: Honestly, yellow isn't really a good color for you.

speaker: Ty
text: But I like it because it's made of cotton. I'm sure it'll be cool to wear.

speaker: Na
text: Yeah, or try the blue one. That color looks nice on you.

speaker: Ty
text: By the way, you promised to give me a watch, remember?

speaker: Na
text: Of course! And you buy me a shirt now, okay?

speaker: Ty
text: What?? … Okay, what about the purple sweater?

speaker: Na
text: I really like it! Thank you so much. It's thick and warm.

speaker: Na
text: By the way, didn't you say that you don't like shopping?

speaker: Ty
text: I do, but it's fun when you come with me.

speaker: Na
text: Awwwww…. I feel the same, hihi.
